text:
(a)     An applicant/recipient of SSIP must reside in the City and County of San Francisco for 15 continuous days prior to the time of application for SSIP benefits. Residency in the City and County of San Francisco is established by physical presence and intent to reside in the City and County of San Francisco, which is satisfactorily substantiated by the applicant. 
     (b)     Eligibility for SSIP will terminate immediately upon abandonment of residency in the City and County of San Francisco.
(Added by Ord. 151-98, App. 5/8/98)
